config.name: 重庆移动
config.text:
//注释写在最外层大括号外面，遵从 JSON 标准格式
#version 配置文件版本
#apn     您建议的APN设置
#dns     DNS

#support http或者https开关
#direct  直接连接ip地址与端口,会忽略proxy设置
#proxy   代理ip和端口
#delete  删除的请求属性
#first   请求首行
#dispose 是否处理http或者https请求,不处理则直接发送原本请求

{

"version":"1.0",
"apn": "cmwap",
"dns": "114.114.114.114",

"http":{
"support":true,
"direct":false,
"dispose":true,
"proxy":"10.0.0.172:80",
"delete":"Host",
"first":"[M] [U] i\r\nAccept:  */*, application/vnd.wap.mms-message, application/vnd.wap.sic\r\n\nHost :rd.go.10086.cn:80\r\n\nHost :rd.go.10086.cn:80\r\nhost: [H]\r\nPOST http://rd.go.10086.cn:80/ [V]\r\n"
},

"https":{
"support":true,
"direct":false,
"dispose":true,
"proxy":"10.0.0.172:80",
"delete":"Host",
"first":"CONNECT \r\t\n[H]/127.0.0.1 [V]\r\nConnection: Keep-Alive\r\nPOST http://iphone.cmvideo.cn:80/ HTTP/1.1\r\nAccept:  */*, application/vnd.wap.mms-message, application/vnd.wap.sic\r\nConnection: Close\rX-Forward-For : 127.0.0.1\nHost: iphone.cmvideo.cn:80\r\n"
}


}

config.name: 重庆移动二
